build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y xvfb && pip install -r requirements.txt && playwright install-deps && playwright install chromium

deploy.startCommand: Xvfb :99 -screen 0 1024x768x24 -ac +extension GLX +render -noreset & export DISPLAY=:99 && uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT --loop asyncio --workers 1
